name: The Good, The Bad, and The Stray
name_original: The Good, The Bad, and The Stray
description:
The Good, The Bad, and The Stray is a short experience created in 48 hours for the 2022 Games for Good gamejam.

It is a 3 player multiplayer experience, where one player plays from the perspective of a homeless person, drifiting away in a city hoping to find a way out.

The other 2 players watch the city from above, and can place hints on the map for the first player to see. On top of this, they can also activate portals scattered throughout the city, leading the homeless player to the exit, or unexpected roads.

The goal of the homeless player is to find a way out of the city. The goal of one of the other two players to help reach this goal, while the other is to make him stay the loop for as long as possible.

This game was made with the the CASA association in mind, an association that helps homeless people get back on their feet
